title: download issues
content:
hi i`m in a complete mess.

i donated as requested then i have lost everything no d/load links , no redirects , ZIP. why is it so difficult to navigate to a d/load ?

i`m trying to restore my TB after my current version failed to d/load e-mails from server this all seemed to happen after latest up-dates its been faultless before this please someone restore my sanity some one on one help would be appreciated

thanks
creator: mokuy1

title: 128.9.1esr
content: Apparently Thunderbird updated itself to 128.9.1esr this afternoon when I restarted my computer. It is now completely useless, I can neither send nor receive email. It was fine this morning, when I presume I still had 128.9.0. My ISP is worse than useless, if you aren't using their lame webmail interface, you don't have a solvable problem. I downgraded back to 128.9.0 by following this post: https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/16jwt7a/%E2%84%B9_how_to_downgrade_from_thunderbird_115_to_102/ It retrieved email exactly once. I closed and reopened Thunderbird and it hasn't worked since. I've repeatedly deleted the compatibility.ini file. I tried updating to the current version and downgrading again and it isn't working. What do I try next?
creator: cable198

title: I need to change my default email address in TB
content: Hi, my company email domain was closed by Google as it was wound up which stopped my email address from working, my old email address was john@jfmcivil.com.au I have a new email address, but the old one is still on my emails, if anyone replies to that address, I won't get the email which is happening. Please advise how I can change the default email address in TB. My new address is: john@jfmcontracting.com.au M. 0408475144 (Australia) Kind regards John McFaul
creator: john1171

title: Login fails for Thunderbird
content: I've been using Thunderbird for years to access my gmail account through my ieee alias. Sometime after 4/2/2025 my login fails with the message "Login to server imap.googlemail.com....failed". I've tried changing the imap server to "imap.gmail.com" but get similar results. For some reason, it appears that something changed on 4/3 that prevents a successful login to the gmail server from Tbird. I have both Tbird and gmail configured for OAuth2.
creator: blahey1

title: メールの送受信が突然、出来なくなりました
content: Windows10で、ドメインはエックスサーバーを使用しています。セキュリティソフトは、スーパーセキュリティを使用していますが、4月8日以降、突然、メールの送受信が出来なくなりました。
creator: stahikuozmiawa

title: Emails being quarantined dues to Thunderbird Filelink HTML attachments
content:
A number of email providers (godaddy most recently) have begun quarantining emails that contain HTML attachments.

This is rendering the Thunderbird Filelink (we're using dropbox) increasingly unusable without the option to DISABLE the .html attachments and just have the file links contained in the body of the email.

Would TRULY appreciate any help with disabling the Filelink .html attachments or having that switch added in the preferences.

Many thanks!
creator: mike836

title: T-Bird has stopped deleting my trash directory on shutdown.
content: I've been running T-Bird v.38.8.0 on a Windows 7 computer for years. I have the server settings for my account to "Empty Trash on Exit", and it's been doing that flawlessly for years. Recently (past few days), it has failed to empty the Trash folder on shutdown. The server settings have not changed (box is still checked to empty the trash on exit). If anyone has experienced this issue, can you help me fix the problem? I would very much appeciate your help. Thank you.
creator: LesF

title: Thunderbird Connector for Copernic Desktop Search
content:
Dear Support!


In order to index Thunderbird Emails in Copernic Desktop Search software, I need to install the “Thunderbird Connector for Copernic Desktop Search” in the Add-on and Themes menu. Unfortunately this Ad-don doesn’t seem to exist. Can you please suggest a solution?

Best Regards, Patrycja Wojcieszynska
creator: shalimarxxw

title: Does not make sense to use Master Password
content:
I want to switch from Outlook and use Thunderbird for our office emails. However there is no way to protect the saved email logins.

When I use a master password, every time the user opens Thunderbird, they need to enter the password but I do not want to give them the master password as it defeats the purpose. Ideally the master password or another setting should protect the saved logins only and the user should be able to login to Thunderbird without additional password.

So this means Thunderbird is not an application to use in office environments?
creator: eyubismail

title: Problem with printing email attachments
content: I have a problem printing email attachments. The printer always prints a blank page. In other applications, the printer works fine, but whenever I try to print an email attachment, it only prints a blank page. Thank you for your help
creator: martinkadlcek
